briefdescription.para: Stores data for drawing Soft Contacts for interaction controllers.
Gets the list of interaction controllers managed by this InteractionManager.
Gets whether auto-generate layers was enabled for this Interaction Manager.
Interaction objects further than this distance from a given controller's hover point will not be considered for any hover interactions with that controller.
Interaction objects further than this distance from a given controller's hover point will not be considered for any contact or grasping interactions with that controller.
A scale that can be used to appropriately transform distances that otherwise expect one Unity unit to correspond to one meter.
Gets a set of all interaction objects currently registered with this Interaction Manager.
Maps a Rigidbody to its attached interaction object, if the Rigidbody is part of and interaction object.
Maps a Rigidbody to its attached ContactBone, if the Rigidbody is part of an interaction controller.

Often, only one InteractionManager is necessary per Unity scene. This property will contain that InteractionManager as soon as its Awake() method is called. Using more than one InteractionManager is valid, but be sure to assign any InteractionBehaviour's desired manager appropriately.

detaileddescription.para: By default, this static property contains the first InteractionManager that has had its Awake() method called in the current scene. If an InteractionBehaviourBase does not have a non-null interactionManager by the time it has Start() called, it will default to using the InteractionManager referenced here.

If you have multiple InteractionManagers in your scene, you should be sure to assign InteractionBehaviours' managers appropriately. If you instantiate an InteractionBehaviour at runtime, you should assign its InteractionManager right after you instantiate it.

briefdescription.para: Stores data for implementing Soft Contact for interaction controllers.
Stores data for implementing Soft Contact for interaction controllers.

memberdef.argsstring: (ReadonlyHashSet< InteractionController > controllers, StateChangeCheckFunc stateCheckFunc, Action< IInteractionBehaviour, List< InteractionController >> actionPerInteractionObject)
memberdef.name: remapInteractionObjectStateChecks

briefdescription.para: Checks object state per-controller, then calls an action per-object with all controller checks that reported back an object.

memberdef.argsstring: (ReadonlyHashSet< InteractionController > controllers, MultiStateChangeCheckFunc multiObjectStateCheckFunc, Action< IInteractionBehaviour, List< InteractionController >> actionPerInteractionObject)
memberdef.name: remapMultiInteractionObjectStateChecks

briefdescription.para: Checks object state per-controller, then calls an action per-object with all controller checks that reported back objects.
Updates the contact bone layer to collide against any layers that may contain interaction objects and ignore any layers that don't.

Returns true if the Interaction Behaviour was registered with this manager; otherwise returns false. The manager is guaranteed not to have the Interaction Behaviour registered after calling this method.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vector3 position, Quaternion rotation, out Vector3 newPosition, out Quaternion newRotation)
memberdef.name: TransformAheadByFixedUpdate

briefdescription.para: Transforms a position and rotation ahead by one FixedUpdate based on the prior motion of the InteractionManager.

detaileddescription.para: This method is used to support having the player in a moving frame of reference.

briefdescription.para: Transforms a position ahead by one FixedUpdate based on the prior motion (position AND rotation) of the InteractionManager.

detaileddescription.para: This method is used to support having the player in a moving frame of reference.

briefdescription.para: Returns a layer mask containing all layers that might contain interaction objects.
